Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-24
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-24. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-24, affected by CVE-2023-3978
